statements: SELECT payment_id, customer_id, payment_amount, payment_frequency, start_date, end_date, active FROM recurring_payments;
SELECT payment_amount, payment_frequency, customer_id, payment_id, active, start_date, end_date FROM recurring_payments;
SELECT * FROM recurring_payments WHERE start_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT payment_id, customer_id FROM recurring_payments WHERE payment_amount >= 100;
SELECT customer_id, payment_frequency, active FROM recurring_payments WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM recurring_payments WHERE payment_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT payment_amount, payment_frequency, start_date FROM recurring_payments WHERE active = true ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, payment_amount, start_date, end_date FROM recurring_payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000 AND payment_frequency = 'monthly';
SELECT * FROM recurring_payments WHERE customer_id IN ('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440001', '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440002');
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(payment_id) AS payment_count FROM recurring_payments GROUP BY customer_id HAVING payment_count >= 5 ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM recurring_payments WHERE payment_amount > 100
SELECT payment_date, payment_method FROM recurring_payments ORDER BY payment_date ASC
SELECT * FROM account_transfers WHERE transfer_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000
SELECT transfer_id, from_account_id, to_account_id, transfer_amount FROM account_transfers WHERE transfer_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT DISTINCT from_account_id FROM account_transfers
SELECT * FROM recurring_payments WHERE customer_id = 'f6dbe008-0049-4ebf-b526-6d51d7ee2cf3';
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM recurring_payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM account_transfers WHERE transfer_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT transfer_id, from_account_id, to_account_id FROM account_transfers WHERE transfer_amount < 500;
SELECT MAX(payment_amount) AS max_payment_amount FROM recurring_payments;
SELECT * FROM recurring_bills WHERE bill_amount > 100
SELECT bill_name, bill_amount FROM recurring_bills WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM recurring_bills
SELECT * FROM recurring_bills WHERE recurring_frequency = 'monthly' ORDER BY bill_amount DESC
SELECT bill_name, SUM(bill_amount) AS total_amount FROM recurring_bills GROUP BY bill_name HAVING total_amount > 500
SELECT * FROM recurring_bills WHERE customer_id = 'a1e3f04d-1636-402f-b97c-3fc7e0d3c52e';
SELECT bill_name, bill_amount FROM recurring_bills WHERE recurring_frequency = 'monthly' ORDER BY bill_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_bills FROM recurring_bills GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT * FROM recurring_bills WHERE bill_id = '4f26a37b-ec79-47b1-8e63-55abfcaf57e1' AND recurring_frequency = 'weekly';
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM recurring_bills WHERE bill_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM recurring_bills;
SELECT bill_name, amount, start_date FROM recurring_bills WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM recurring_bills GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_accounts ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT customer_id, account_type, last_activity FROM customer_accounts WHERE last_activity > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM recurring_bills ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT bill_name, amount FROM recurring_bills WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM recurring_bills GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM customer_accounts WHERE balance < 0 ORDER BY last_activity ASC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS num_transfers FROM transfer_history GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY num_transfers DESC;
SELECT * FROM recurring_bills WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT bill_id, bill_amount FROM recurring_bills WHERE bill_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM account_balances ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT customer_id, preferred_payment_method FROM customer_preferences WHERE notification_preference = 'Email';
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' AND transaction_date <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM recurring_bills WHERE bill_amount > 1000 ORDER BY bill_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, payment_frequency FROM recurring_bills WHERE payment_frequency = 'Monthly' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM account_balances WHERE balance < 0 ORDER BY last_updated ASC, account_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, preferred_payment_method, preferred_transfer_day FROM customer_preferences ORDER BY preferred_transfer_day, customer_id;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
